verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord I want to take the time
Just to praise your holy name
Because you´ve been
Been so good to me
So from the rising of the sun
Until the going down of the same
Lord your name alone
Is worthy to be praised

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Jehovah Nissi, the Lord our banner
Jehovah Rapha, the Lord our healer
Jehovah Shalom, the Lord our peace
Jehovah Shammah, the Lord is present
Jehovah Raah, the Lord our shepherd
Jehovah Tsidkenu, the Lord our righteousness
Jehovah Shalom, the Lord our Peace
Jehovah Jireh, he provideth all our needs

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are the great I Am, that I Am
The God that was, is and is to come
Prophet, Priest and King
Eagle, Lamb and Lion
Son of Man, Son of God and Son of David

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are the Rose of Sharon
You´re the Lily of the valley
You´re the bright and morning star
That´s who you are
The mighty Conqueror
That´s been unconquered by tradition
The Lord God Jehovah is His name
